title: Early closure on Circle Line station maintenance for Stage 6 integration

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线车站维护以进行第6阶段集成提前关闭
title_translations.ms: Penutupan awal penyelenggaraan stesen Laluan Bulat untuk integrasi Peringkat 6
title_translations.ta: நிலை 6 ஒருங்கிணைப்பிற்கான வட்டப் பாதையில் நிலையப் பராமரிப்பு குறித்த முன்கூட்டிய மூடல்

updates.text: SINGAPORE: All train services on the Circle Line (CCL) will resume normal operations from Saturday (Apr 6) as rail expansion works have been completed ahead of schedule, said the Land Transport Authority (LTA) on Wednesday. "We’re happy to update that the integration of the CCL with our existing rail net
A platform each at two Circle Line stations - Telok Blangah and HarbourFront - will also be closed temporarily.
